data.title: Hot Soup!!!
data.text:
Ordered the Udon Noodle Soup, which came out in a bubbling caldron, way too hot to eat immediately. After about 10. Minutes, when the blow torching of my tongue finally subsided, I really enjoyed my huge bowl of noodles, vegetables, and tiny pieces of spicy chicken. 
I will definitely return to try the Korean-style deep fried chicken wings.

data.title: Better than expected.
data.text:
We've been passing this restaurant for over a year now and finally decided to try it.
So glad we did as we found another great eatery in downtown Union!   The place was clean and staff friendly.   We were the first customer of the day but her attentiveness was much appreciated.   The chicken was exceptional along with the Japchae and  House Fried Rice.   Will definitely be back to try the Takoyaki (fried octopus dumplings) and Bulgogi Sliders.
